QuestionList.question: Acts like an owner when they make decisions.
Can be counted on to do what they say they are going to do.
Defines roles, rights, and responsibilities of employees
Tackles issues head on and finds solutions.
Takes responsibility for results.
Communicates with colleagues, both verbally and in writing.
Demonstrates active listening and shows an understanding of others' perspectives.
Has a good ability to work with others in a team environment.
Can handle disagreements or conflicts in a constructive and respectful manner
Builds and maintains professional relationships within the organization.
Communicates the team's goals and objectives effectively.
Consistently demonstrates strategic thinking and decision-making abilities.
Motivates and inspires the team to achieve high performance.
Handles conflict and difficult situations effectively while maintaining respect and professionalism.
Actively seeks feedback and demonstrates a willingness to make improvements in their leadership style.
Can consistently apply logical and creative thinking to solve problems.
Can identify potential problems before they escalate.
Can effectively prioritize and address multiple problems simultaneously.
Effectively utilizes resources and collaborates with others to solve complex problems.
Is adept at finding solutions that align with the organization's strategic objectives.
Clearly expresses their ideas and information in verbal conversations.
Can write clear, concise, and effective emails and reports.
Listens attentively and responds appropriately to others' viewpoints.
Communicates effectively during team meetings or presentations.
Communicates complex concepts or information in a way that is easy for others to understand.
Displays a positive attitude and enthusiasm toward their work.
Consistently meets their deadlines and achieves their targets.
Takes initiative in their tasks and responsibilities.
Seeks opportunities for professional growth and development.
Shows resilience and perseverance in the face of challenges or setbacks.
Consistently completes tasks on time without sacrificing quality.
Can effectively manage their workload and prioritize tasks according to urgency and importance.
Uses resources (time, tools, manpower) efficiently.
Can identify and implement methods for improving processes or procedures in their work.
Effectively minimizes waste or redundancies in their work.
